dataset.title: On-line Systematic Catalog of Plant Bugs (Insecta - Heteroptera - Miridae)

abstract.para: The Planetary Biodiversity Inventory (PBI) for Plant Bugs provides a resource about the global plant bug subfamilies Orthotylinae and Phylinae (Insecta - Heteroptera - Miridae) to systematists, insect ecologists, conservation biologists, the general public, and students via the Internet. The database was made possible with the generous support from the National Science Foundation in 2003-2011.

gbif.citation: Schuh, R. T. (2016). On-line Systematic Catalog of Plant Bugs (Insecta - Heteroptera - Miridae). In O. Bánki, Y. Roskov, M. Döring, G. Ower, L. Vandepitte, D. Hobern, D. Remsen, P. Schalk, R. E. DeWalt, M. Keping, J. Miller, T. Orrell, R. Aalbu, R. Adlard, E. M. Adriaenssens, C. Aedo, E. Aescht, N. Akkari, P. Alfenas-Zerbini, et al., Catalogue of Life Checklist (Mar 2013). https://doi.org/10.48580/dfp3-3ff
